title: New: Little Kid – River of Blood
body: Artwork by [Marija Kovach](http://www.flickr.com/photos/marijakevakraba/) The story behind the creation of [**Little Kid**‘s](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/8492-introducing-little-kid/ "Introducing: Little Kid") music is sometimes as enthralling as the stories within the songs. **Kenny Boothby** (Kid) is clearly someone with a lust for experimentation. The organ in his new track River of Blood for example, was a single note played directly into a microcassette recorder for the duration of the cassette; adjusting the tape’s playback speed then changed the note’s pitch. Away from the experimentation is a voice and a message that is rooted in classic songwriting, a reverberating acoustic guitars and the most human of voices deliver a moment of pure human introspection. Steam and download the song below. River of Blood by Little Kid
